title: Bug 8142 - No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects
description: Bug 8142 - No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects. I don't understand it.
OB: When attempting to view the scoped type hierarchy of a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant), I get the following error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. BTW, what does the message mean?
EB: I expect to see the scoped type hierarchy of the selected binary project, displaying the class hierarchies of its internal jars.
SR:
1. Open the software and navigate to the scoped type hierarchy feature.
2. Select a binary project, for example, org.apache.ant.
3. Attempt to view the scoped type hierarchy.
4. Observe the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
